data.question: What is the formula for the cobalt(II) MOF discussed in the article?
What color change occurs to [Co<sup>II</sup><sub>3</sub>(lac)<sub>2</sub>(pybz)<sub>2</sub>] upon post-synthetic modification with water?
data.answer: The color changes from purple to green.

data.question: True or False: The magnetic properties of the cobalt(II) MOF are unaffected by post-synthetic modification.
What is the maximum iodine uptake for [Co<sup>II</sup><sub>3</sub>(lac)<sub>2</sub>(pybz)<sub>2</sub>]?
What is the electrical conductivity of [Co<sup>II</sup><sub>3</sub>(lac)<sub>2</sub>(pybz)<sub>2</sub>]·2.7I<sub>2</sub>?
What magnetic ground state is observed for the desolvated [Co<sup>II</sup><sub>3</sub>(lac)<sub>2</sub>(pybz)<sub>2</sub>]?
True or False: The framework of [Co<sup>II</sup><sub>3</sub>(lac)<sub>2</sub>(pybz)<sub>2</sub>] is altered upon solvent exchange.
What is the effect of partial oxidation by molecular iodine on the magnetic properties of [Co<sup>II</sup><sub>3</sub>(lac)<sub>2</sub>(pybz)<sub>2</sub>]
data.answer: It transforms the magnetism from a canted antiferromagnet to a ferromagnet.

data.question: True or False: The iodine-loaded [Co<sup>II</sup><sub>3</sub>(lac)<sub>2</sub>(pybz)<sub>2</sub>]·2.7I<sub>2</sub> exhibits electrical conductivity.
What is the Langmuir surface area of [Co<sup>II</sup><sub>3</sub>(lac)<sub>2</sub>(pybz)<sub>2</sub>]

What is the color change observed for [Co<sup>III</sup>Co<sup>II</sup><sub>2</sub>(pybz)<sub>2</sub>(lac)<sub>2</sub>(H<sub>2</sub>O)<sub>2</sub>]I·2H<sub>2</sub>O·1.5DMSO upon post-synthetic modification?
data.answer: The color changes from dark purple to orange-yellow.

data.question: True or False: The gas sorption properties of [Co<sup>II</sup><sub>3</sub>(lac)<sub>2</sub>(pybz)<sub>2</sub>] are enhanced upon post-synthetic modification.
What is the critical temperature for the ferrimagnetic state observed in hydrated [Co<sup>II</sup><sub>3</sub>(pybz)<sub>2</sub>(lac)<sub>2</sub>(H<sub>2</sub>O)<sub>2</sub>]·7H<sub>2</sub>O?
What is the role of DMF in the post-synthetic modification of [Co<sup>II</sup><sub>3</sub>(lac)<sub>2</sub>(pybz)<sub>2</sub>]
data.answer: DMF acts as a solvent that can recover the crystalline state of the framework.

data.question: True or False: The magnetic ground state of [Co<sup>II</sup><sub>3</sub>(lac)<sub>2</sub>(pybz)<sub>2</sub>] can be switched between four different states through post-synthetic modification.
What is the significance of the color change from purple to green in [Co<sup>II</sup><sub>3</sub>(lac)<sub>2</sub>(pybz)<sub>2</sub>] upon hydration?
data.answer: It indicates a change in the coordination geometry of the cobalt center.

data.question: True or False: The iodine-loaded [Co<sup>II</sup><sub>3</sub>(lac)<sub>2</sub>(pybz)<sub>2</sub>]·2.7I<sub>2</sub> has a higher electrical conductivity compared to its Zn analogue.
What is the effect of desolvation on the magnetic properties of [Co<sup>II</sup><sub>3</sub>(lac)<sub>2</sub>(pybz)<sub>2</sub>]
data.answer: It behaves as a single-chain magnet.

data.question: True or False: The crystallinity of [Co<sup>II</sup><sub>3</sub>(lac)<sub>2</sub>(pybz)<sub>2</sub>] is maintained after solvent exchange with methanol.
What is the role of iodine in the post-synthetic modification of [Co<sup>II</sup><sub>3</sub>(lac)<sub>2</sub>(pybz)<sub>2</sub>]
data.answer: Iodine acts as an oxidizing agent that partially oxidizes the metal center, leading to a change in magnetic properties.
